---
title: "Autoplot"
output: github_document
---

```{r}
# library(ffsimulator)
pkgload::load_all()
library(ggplot2)
library(furrr)

plan(multisession)

conn <- mfl_connect(2021,22627)

tictoc::tic()
sims_p <- ff_simulate(conn, parallel = TRUE, n_seasons=100, seed = 613)
tictoc::toc()

tictoc::tic()
sims <- ff_simulate(conn, parallel = FALSE, n_seasons=100, seed = 613)
tictoc::toc()

waldo::compare(sims$summary_simulation, sims_p$summary_simulation)

autoplot(sims)
```


```{r}
autoplot(sims,"rank")
```


```{r}
autoplot(sims,"points")

```
